company.name: Onset
company.summary: The HOBOlink® Web Services API is an application programming interface that enables organizations to easily integrate energy and environmental data from Onset HOBOlink web servers with custom software applications. It will be utilized by a range of users, from building energy dashboard suppliers to developers looking to embed real-time weather data from Onset HOBO® U30 monitoring systems i
company.details: The HOBOlink® Web Services API is an application programming interface that enables organizations to easily integrate energy and environmental data from Onset HOBOlink web servers with custom software applications. It will be utilized by a range of users, from building energy dashboard suppliers to developers looking to embed real-time weather data from Onset HOBO® U30 monitoring systems into web-based portals.

company.name: EnergyStar
company.summary: EPA's Automated Benchmarking System (ABS) is a free web service designed to exchange energy use data and facility information, with EPA's Portfolio Manager software tool. Using XML-based Web Services provided by the EPA, third-party energy service companies can securely provide energy and building data from their systems to Portfolio Manager in exchange for receiving the EPA's energy performance r
company.details: EPA's Automated Benchmarking System (ABS) is a free web service designed to exchange energy use data and facility information, with EPA's Portfolio Manager software tool. Using XML-based Web Services provided by the EPA, third-party energy service companies can securely provide energy and building data from their systems to Portfolio Manager in exchange for receiving the EPA's energy performance rating and other related energy and environmental performance metrics. The documents and applications described below help you assess the technical knowledge necessary to use ABS to provide your customers with the 1 to 100 energy performance ratings.

company.name: Home Energy Saver
company.summary: The Home Energy Saver tool suite and APIs--the culmination of a decade and a half of development by the U.S. Department of Energy’s Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory--provides web-based residential energy calculators for consumers and professionals. These tools provide customized estimates of residential energy use, energy bills, and greenhouse-gas emissions, based on information provide
company.details: The Home Energy Saver tool suite and APIs--the culmination of a decade and a half of development by the U.S. Department of Energy’s Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory--provides web-based residential energy calculators for consumers and professionals. These tools provide customized estimates of residential energy use, energy bills, and greenhouse-gas emissions, based on information provided by the user. The service identifies and ranks potential energy-saving strategies for any single family detached or townhouse style home and multifamily appartment buildings.

company.name: Tendril
company.summary: Tendril focuses on the efficient use of energy by creating energy usage metric devices and analysis software to highlight excesses. Their technology facilitates a dialog between consumers and suppliers through an energy ecosystem that connects in-home devices (like thermostats) to the utility back office.
company.details: Tendril focuses on the efficient use of energy by creating energy usage metric devices and analysis software to highlight excesses. Their technology facilitates a dialog between consumers and suppliers through an energy ecosystem that connects in-home devices (like thermostats) to the utility back office.

company.name: WattzOn
company.summary: WattzOn is a personal energy management platform that helps companies, communities and individuals to save money and energy. WattzOn combines advanced technology, behavioral science and powerful data and analytics to provide innovative energy management solutions.
company.details: WattzOn is a personal energy management platform that helps companies, communities and individuals to save money and energy. WattzOn combines advanced technology, behavioral science and powerful data and analytics to provide innovative energy management solutions.

company.name: Istabai
company.summary: Istabai is an application that allows users to manage their home heating systems from anywhere with an internet connection. Users can set the service up simply by changing their radiator head and plugging in Istabai's internet cable. The Istabai mobile application and web solution will relay the current temperature to the user and allow them to regulate it as they like. The system can also be acce
company.details: Istabai is an application that allows users to manage their home heating systems from anywhere with an internet connection. Users can set the service up simply by changing their radiator head and plugging in Istabai's internet cable. The Istabai mobile application and web solution will relay the current temperature to the user and allow them to regulate it as they like. The system can also be accessed and controlled programmatically via REST API. The Istabai website is provided in English, Russian, and Latvian.

company.name: Nest
company.summary: Nest Labs is the creator of the world’s first Learning Thermostat. Nest learns from your temperature adjustments, programs itself to keep you comfortable, and guides you to energy savings.
